Blog.post: nothing new has been happening lately, i dont feel like doing anything special... i been hangin out with laginestra, tom, ben and a variety of drunken girls... its been fun because ive been getting drunk to, well within my limits... i cant complain... things are going well socially but academically im circling the shit hole, grades are F, D... and i dont know what the fuck imma have to pull outta my ass to pass geometry for summerschool... im not taking it seriously enough... it'd be a damn shame if i failed, and i wasted all these precious hours i invest in the first academically smart move i do in my life... (that and moving here) whatever... so everything is great with my girlfriend, and my friends the summer still has one more month to go, the month of august, its like one big sunday... but ill enjoy the month of free time i have before the school year begins and we are all juniors..... the hardest year of highschool is ahead of us... i hope i do good.. fuck that--- i know ill do good... im out interesting fact of the day The Pentagon, in Arlington, Virginia, has twice as manybathrooms as is necessary. When it was built in the 1940s, thestate of Virginia still had segregation laws requiring separatetoilet facilities for blacks and whites.

mom and dad's anniversary 21 years woke up went to a mothafuckin gangsta ass breakfast i almost shit myself in ihop...madd good though.. my parents left to a barbeque somewhere with my dad's work friends and then galen came over then tom then abuelo then we went to laginestra's house for some good old fun fun... we swam and me galen tom and ben and of course laginestra.... i had a cunt load of fun... like the size of ur mom's pussy lips after shitting u out.. ;-) sorry.. im kinda out of it right now... anyway prior to all that- some douche bag robbed bianca of 120 dollars and natalie copped beef with him... bianca's like our little sister we look out for her... and there's no way we gonna let some fag get away witth stealing 120 beans of b's loot... so in a matter of minutes... me, tom, galen, easter, mikey and paul are outside haven a bogert... and we hear madd loud bass from down the block getting closer and closer...then we see this BMW m3, and a escalade with 20s roll up to the front of the house and then they get outta the car and start yellin at tthis kid on the fone... and i talkedon the fone with him for some - the kid's a douche bag.. he has 2 days... and i really dont think 120 beans is worth what he's gonna get himself into... im outtie charlie... interestin fact of the day The phrase "rule of thumb" is derived from an old English law which stated that you couldn't beat your wife with anything wider than your thumb. and the first thing to ever break the sound barrier was before boat, planes, bows and arrows and cannons, or bullets.... was indeed.... a whip

the day started out something like this... i got outta school got a haircut and cut my dad's hair... we came out lookin better then we walked in.. then i got dropped off downtown and met up with Glenn and PT... we ended up buying bogerts and going back to PTs where i chain-smoked.. wasn't to bad... mediocre compared to the rest of the night... so i end up walking home with glenn, drunken kracke, and tom.. so whatever we seperate, and it's just me and Tom, then we're walking home, and laginestra, bianca and ben come from behind us in old county road they going to laginestra's to swim and drink, so me and tom tag along and go swimming with them, Bianca got fucking PLASTERED.. so drunk, she was madd fun.. she went crazy on us. i had mad fun we just smoked cigerettes in the hot tub and chilled and had good conversation, (bianca was in her own little world) we got outta the pool and chilled for like a good half hour bullshitting smoking.. wasn't bad at all -- that was the highlightof the night there's much much much more details that made it a lot butter but i wanna keep it vague and secretive.. whatever then we end up leavin and Guiseppe picks up bianca from laginestra's ... me ben and tom leave and just walk and talk about what tom missed in his 21 days of teen tour... the night was amazing and i definitely want to chill with Laginestra, Ben and Tom more often... they are going to make my summer "a summer..." madd funn chillin with my goons again.. i missed em.. i had a fucking blast... les make it hot.. charlie

today was good, me and galen hung out for the majority of the day, it was fun... Luke cock block master, calls me up and then tells me that he's outside wanting some medicine for the head, then he keeps buggin me about it like he expected me to have it... it was annoying-i told him a didnt have any but i really only had one left but i was holding it for 2 other people so i dont know.. i regret it.. i wish i woulda just sold it to him but i dont wanna call him up and disappoint him because i did lie to him.. it'd just make me look like an asshole.. i hope i get hooked up later... some more... i have to see... so whatever the day was good but pushin is a very big hastle especially when u have crack heads rollin up to your crib when u gotyour girl over and u just chillin with her.. madd annoying.. 1 left... let's hear it for street pharmacy.. Interesting Fact of the Day Clans of long ago that wanted to get rid of their unwanted people without killing them used to burn their houses down -hence the expression "to get fired."

i spent today with my family, like most of the sundays its completely based on that i have school the next day... which obviously sucks and ruins my mood for a decent portion of the day but whatever... sundays are sundays... willie came over as soon as i woke up and we just chilled and watched TV... played some video games... but the highlight of my day isnt that i got to hang out with my older brother, is that an ex-business partner came by today to drop off a delivery... call me ... it has to do with my street pharmacy job... hehe whatever.. call me if u need... i have a limited supply but this time ill refill consistantly... i hope so at least.. interesting fact of the day the average life-span of a major league baseball is 7 pitches....
Hahah this is 100000%better then Xanga and Live Journal combined! woo woo! i love this thing.. this is where imma post my updates from now on.. this is the last time i ever change my online blog...

Galen went away, far far away... Lake George with Matt for a week ... so for this following week i plan to spend it with the GOONs... Lag, Tom, and Ben... i think Tom went to Wisconsin so i dont know it'll just be the 3 of us... nothing happened really 3 weeks till school begins.. or is it 2? i dont know .. im madd bored now, gonna wait for my dad to get back from peach pickin to help him in the basement.. .................................................. ugh nothing to post... Interesting Fact of the Day/Post Reno, Nevada is west of Los Angeles, California. In 10 minutes, a hurricane releases more energy than all theworld's nuclear weapons combined.

i finished Geometry, i am goin to Algebra 2 next year.. im finally done, yesterday i celebrated with Galen, we chilled at my house then her then back at mine we made ice cream whatever whatever... i am madd bored, i wanna go see collateral, or open water with my family collateral is a priority, we'll see... hopefully i get to go to North Bergen this weekend, i wanna see my cousin, we gotta celebrate our birthdays prolly roastin a fat blunt, then drinkin at his nigga's house... im madd bored home and i have really nothing to post about just that everything is goin good so far, summer school is over, and i have 1 month to really enjoy my summer, August (one big sunday) school is just around the corner, i can't wait we juniors.. pretty hard ass year... iight so im out peace.. Interesting Fact of the Day/Post It takes 3,000 cows to supply the NFL with enough leather for ayear's supply of footballs.

whatever so today i went to tom's house and watched The HEAT, with him and laginestra, Diana came over for a little bit... then she got picked up by her man... whatever.. so then we get pick up by ben in his car and we drove around to look for these kids who shiested lag outta some money we didnt find him... then we went back to ben's to drink,.. this was about 11.2o then we went to jackie harowitz's house where i just chilled with terrence (his b-day) then we back ... i got dropped off and here i am.... i have a sti which is buggin me iin my left eye on my right eye-lid.. shit hurts.. i have to go to summer school tomorrow.. im so sick of this shit-hole summer already its just gettin me upset... i was better off in febuary... charlie.. Download >> Creedence Clearwater Revival - "Fortunate Son" FORTUNATE SON Some folks are born made to wave the flag, ooh, they're red, white and blue. And when the band plays "Hail To The Chief", oh, they point the cannon at you, Lord, It ain't me, it ain't me, I ain't no senator's son, It ain't me, it ain't me, I ain't no fortunate one, no, Some folks are born silver spoon in hand, Lord, don't they help themselves, oh. But when the taxman come to the door, Lord, the house look a like a rummage sale, yes, It ain't me, it ain't me, I ain't no millionaire's son. It ain't me, it ain't me, I ain't no fortunate one, no. Yeh, some folks inherit star spangled eyes, ooh, they send you down to war, Lord, And when you ask them, how much should we give, oh, they only answer, more, more, more, yoh, It ain't me, it ain't me, I ain't no military son, It ain't me, it ain't me, I ain't no fortunate one, It ain't me, it ain't me, I ain't no fortunate one, no no no, It ain't me, it ain't me, I ain't no fortunate son, no no no, Interestin Fact of the Day/Post No NFL team which plays its home games in a domed stadium has ever won a Superbowl.
